    • Uses of EncryptionCodec in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl

      Classes in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl that implement EncryptionCodec 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractEncryptionCodec
      Abstract base class that contains everything an EncryptionCodec needs to do apart from the actual encrypt and decrypt routines, which are cipher specific.

      Encrypt the given string with the supplied codec and use the supplied charset name for any string/byte conversions.
